title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
July 2, 2020
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:     Thompson Michael Dietz, of New Jersey, to be a Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a term of fifteen years, vice Victor J. Wolski, term expired.     Taylor B. McNeel, of Mississippi, to be United States District Judge for the Southern District of Mississippi, vice Louis Guirola, Jr., retired.
